title: FinTrack - Personal Expense Tracker
desc: A full-stack MERN application for tracking daily expenses, setting budgets, and visualizing spending habits with interactive charts.

title: Automated Student Attendance System
desc: An analytics-driven system to monitor student attendance using a dashboard that provides insights into attendance trends.

title: E-Commerce Backend API
desc: A robust RESTful API built with Java and Spring Boot featuring JWT authentication, product management, and order processing.

title: Student Management Portal
desc: A PHP-based portal for managing student records, course enrollments, and exam results with a secure admin panel.

title: Next.js Dev Portfolio
desc: A high-performance portfolio website built with Next.js featuring server-side rendering and a clean, minimalist design.

title: Crypto Price Tracker
desc: A real-time cryptocurrency tracker using the CoinGecko API to display live price updates and market capitalization.

title: Task Management Kanban
desc: A drag-and-drop Kanban board for project management, allowing users to move tasks through different stages of completion.

title: Social Media Feed API
desc: A Node.js and MongoDB backend supporting user posts, comments, likes, and follower relationships.

title: Hospital Management System
desc: A desktop application for managing doctor appointments and patient records using Java Swing and MySQL.

title: Weather Forecast Dashboard
desc: A weather app that uses the OpenWeatherMap API to provide detailed forecasts based on the user's location.
